title: load testing with loadtest - a primer
description: The industry-standard performance testing tool JMeter comes with all the bells and whistles for the most intricate xml-based performance tests you can imagine... but often what you need to understand is simply 'how many people can use this at once?' Abstracting away the complexities of load testing and JMeter, loadtest allows for straight-forward performance testing accompanied with detailed visualizations and results handily available - all from the comfort of R.
